channel.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
channel.description:
I have java installed, I have versions 1.6.0_05, 1.6.0_06, and 1.6.0_11 I believe. I usually don't have trouble running servers/clients but recently I experience an error upon clicking on the .bat files for running richscape/ some clients. The error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Any help would be greatly appreciated. My computer I'm using is:
32 bit windows xp home service pack 2 XFX Nvidia GeForce 9800 GT Kingston 4GB RAM ASUS P5Q Motherboard Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 Ghz
EDIT: I placed a download Richscape version 4.3, unedited, not my server just so people can use it to help me out if they want.

item.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Hmmm is there another way to solve the problem? Sorry, I’ve had some bad experiences with that kind of stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Hmmm, well give me a min. I’m going to PM you this as it would be spam if i posted it. Check your PM box.

Read full topic

item.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:14, topic:265804”][quote author=Mod Whip link=topic=350930.msg2695142#msg2695142 date=1236207897]

@echo off
title Richscape
java Server
pause

Try that

I’m still getting the same error. Do you think it’s something wrong with the server or jdk or something?
[/quote]

What i gave you should work as long as the run.bat is located where the class files are. where are your class files at?[/quote]
They’re in the same folder.

Read full topic

java Server
pause

Try that
[/quote]
I’m still getting the same error. Do you think it’s something wrong with the server or jdk or something?[/quote]

What i gave you should work as long as the run.bat is located where the class files are. where are your class files at?

Read full topic

show me your run.bat…

item.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:8, topic:265804”][quote author=Mod Whip link=topic=350930.msg2695112#msg2695112 date=1236206724]
I recompiled, still no luck.
[/quote]

Is your batch file in another folder than your .class files?[/quote]
I had to move the .class files and the batch’s (the compiler and the runner) into the same folder as my java files, still doesn’t work.

EDIT: I might want to clarify this: After extracting the server, you get 2 folders and 2 files in the root. The files are build.bat (a compiler) and initialize.bat (aka run.bat). The 2 folders are “Players” (which is just character related files, and “Source” (which has all the server files).

Inside the “Source” folder, there are 3 folders: “Bin” containing all the .class files, “Config” with .cfc and .dat files, and “Data” which are just files for logs and stuff that the client class writes strings into for stuff like banned characters. In the root of the “Source” folder, you have only .java files.

Read full topic

item.title: Help running Richscape 4.3
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

I have java installed, I have versions 1.6.0_05, 1.6.0_06, and 1.6.0_11 I believe.
I usually don’t have trouble running servers/clients but recently I experience an error upon clicking on the .bat files for running richscape/ some clients. The error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
My computer I’m using is:

32 bit windows xp home service pack 2
XFX Nvidia GeForce 9800 GT
Kingston 4GB RAM
ASUS P5Q Motherboard
Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 Ghz

EDIT:
I placed a download Richscape version 4.3, unedited, not my server just so people can use it to help me out if they want.

Read full topic
